title: I Am Stupid, Who Do I Fear? - Novel Updates
tags: Ancient China   Average-looking Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Politics   Polyandry   Reverse Harem   Royalty   Transmigration
author: 若香幽兰
description:
Night of the wedding, “wife, be good, wipe the saliva.” She collected the handkerchief and wiped her lips. “Come, be good, blow!

Really taking me as a fool ah! Sadly he’s right, this big wedding night, facing a stupid wife, wiping the mouth, not to even talk of urine.

Want to have a hot night with the new wife, but has snot on her face together with a runny nose.

Heavens ah, when will this bitter ‘b’ day end!>
